entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: E 53 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
